original_text: And the Lord was so angry with Aaron that he was ready to destroy him. And I prayed for Aaron also at the same time.
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 아론에게 진노하사 그를 멸하려 하셨으므로 내가 그 때에도 아론을 위하여 기도하고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord was so angry with Aaron
that he was ready to destroy him.
And I prayed for Aaron also
